plot: Harvee Gladhand, bound to a wheelchair, meets his paraplegic hero Mack McMonday. Once a stuntman, Mack's exploits inspire Harvee to attempt a stunt once thought impossible.
title: Harvee Gladhand: Annals of Optimism
plot_es: Harvee Gladhand, bound to a wheelchair, meets his paraplegic hero Mack McMonday. Once a stuntman, Mack's exploits inspire Harvee to attempt a stunt once thought impossible.
plot_en: Harvee Gladhand, bound to a wheelchair, meets his paraplegic hero Mack McMonday. Once a stuntman, Mack's exploits inspire Harvee to attempt a stunt once thought impossible.
